mapper.insert: insert into TB_002 (announce_proper_num, announce_title, announce_content, announce_start_date, announce_end_date, admin_proper_num, trial_fcltt_proper_num ) select coalesce ( (select max(announce_proper_num)+1 from TB_002 where cast(substring(announce_proper_num, 1, 6) as date) = DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(), '%y%m%d')) , concat(DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(), '%y%m%d'), '00001') ), #{announce_title}, #{announce_content}, #{announce_start_date}, #{announce_end_date}, #{admin_proper_num}, #{trial_fcltt_proper_num}
mapper.select: select announce_proper_num from TB_002 where admin_proper_num = #{admin_proper_num} order by announce_proper_num desc limit 1

select * from TB_002 where
1 = 1
trial_fcltt_proper_num LIKE '10%'
trial_fcltt_proper_num LIKE '20%'
trial_fcltt_proper_num LIKE '30%'
trial_fcltt_proper_num LIKE '40%'
trial_fcltt_proper_num LIKE '50%'
SELECT * FROM TB_002 WHERE announce_proper_num < #{announce_proper_num} ORDER BY announce_proper_num DESC LIMIT 1;
SELECT * FROM TB_002 WHERE announce_proper_num > #{announce_proper_num} ORDER BY announce_proper_num ASC LIMIT 1;
mapper.update: update TB_002 set announce_title = #{announce_title}, announce_content = #{announce_content}, announce_start_date = #{announce_start_date}, announce_end_date = #{announce_end_date}, announce_last_date = now() where announce_proper_num = #{announce_proper_num}
